q: The show also boosted careers of comics including Billy Crystal , Arsenio Hall and David Letterman . Jack Wishna said Don Kirshner was a mentor who knew the art of discovering talent and cared about the artists he worked with. He was a father to these people even though some of them were three or four years younger than him, Jack Wishna said.
